item.title: Funko Unveils Batman 85th Anniversary Digital POP! Collection
item.description: Exclusive: Funko announces a villain-themed digital Pop! collection in honor of the 85th anniversary of the iconic DC Comics character Batman.

item.title: 10 Actors Who Proved Everyone Wrong After Casting Backlash
item.description: From Joker to James Bond, there's a collection of cinema's greatest comeback stories from actors who received criticism upon being cast.

item.title: I Will Never Look At Flying Monkeys The Same After Wicked
item.description: The flying monkeys play a huge role in The Wizard of Oz, but Wicked gives them a tragic backstory that totally changes their purpose in the story.
